assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The present experiment was part of a research project approved by the Institute Research Council (IRC) of ICAR- Central Institute of Fisheries Education (Deemed University), Mumbai, India (Project code: CIFE-2012/7). The experimental procedures followed were in compliance with the guidelines of IRC.
